name: Sin Senos No Hay Paraíso
description: Sin Senos No Hay Paraíso is a TV series starring Carmen Villalobos, Catherine Siachoque, and María Fernanda Yepes. Sin Senos No Hay Paraiso tells the tragic story of a young woman named Catalina Santana who's ambition is so strong...

review.name: Amazing Soap Opera, Good Lesssons
review.reviewBody:
the Colombian series "Sin Senos No Hay Paraiso" started sometime in June 2008 which began with a decent young girl by her name of Catalina Santana, who is very rich in friendship and love but suffers from a economical situations, that end up choosing a terrible decision to become a prostitute, leaving her decency and reputation in the floor, above that her boyfriend Albeiro who is always looking up to her, but afterwards fells to her in pity, now Catalina also suffers from her breast since she has very few small and needs the silicone to the future, since this will be her passport to paradise.

With her "best friend" Yesica that is the first one to support her in the decision that will haunt her life and subsequently her fate, Yesica full of ambitions more that her, betrays her few ways, meanwhile Catalina continues to sleep with men for money, for me this novela has a lesson which is the next: "keep your decency, focus on the study and never choose the easy side or you'll end up like various people including this woman" anyway i give this season a 1o rate!!!
